code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Vastu=()=>{useEffect(()=>{if(window.DeviceOrientationEvent){window.addEventListener("deviceorientation",event=>{const heading=event.webkitCompassHeading||event.alpha;if(heading!==null&&!isNaN(heading)){document.getElementById("compass-value").textContent="Heading: "+Math.round(heading)+"°";}});}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Vastu Recommendations"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{style:{textAlign:"left"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Entrance should be in the North-East direction for positive energy."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Kitchen is best placed in the South-East corner."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Master bedroom should be in the South-West corner."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Puja room should be in the North-East corner."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Avoid placing mirrors in front of the bed."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"compass-value",style:{marginTop:"20px"},children:"Heading: --\xB0"})]});};export default Vastu;
